name: Zen_and_the_Art_of_Motorcycle_Maintenance
text:
Zen and the Art of Motorcycle Maintenance
"Read it five times; next time through I think I'm really going to figure it out."
 ―Ed Hurley
Zen and the Art of Motorcycle Maintenance was a book written by Robert M. Pirsig.
A favorite of Ed Hurley, a copy of the book was kept at the Bookhouse.
Behind the scenes
Zen and the Art of Motorcycle Maintenance is a 1974 book by Robert M. Pirsig.
